org.researchstack.backbone.answerformat

Class ChoiceAnswerFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.backbone.answerformat.AnswerFormat
      • org.researchstack.backbone.answerformat.ChoiceAnswerFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanAnswerFormat

    public class ChoiceAnswerFormat
extends AnswerFormat
    The ChoiceAnswerFormat class represents an answer format that lets participants choose from a fixed set of text choices in a multiple or single choice question.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.researchstack.backbone.answerformat.AnswerFormat

        AnswerFormat.ChoiceAnswerStyle, AnswerFormat.DateAnswerStyle, AnswerFormat.NumberFormattingStyle, AnswerFormat.QuestionType, AnswerFormat.Type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChoiceAnswerFormat(AnswerFormat.ChoiceAnswerStyle answerStyle, Choice... choices)
      Creates an answer format with the specified answerStyle(single or multichoice) and collection of choices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Choice[] getChoices()
      Returns a copy of the choice array
      AnswerFormat.QuestionType getQuestionType()
      Returns a multiple choice or single choice question type, which will decide which StepBody to use to display this question.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChoiceAnswerFormat

        public ChoiceAnswerFormat(AnswerFormat.ChoiceAnswerStyle answerStyle,
                          Choice... choices)
        Creates an answer format with the specified answerStyle(single or multichoice) and collection of choices.
        Parameters:
        answerStyle - either MultipleChoice or SingleChoice
        choices - an array of Choice objects, all of the same type

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestionType

        public AnswerFormat.QuestionType getQuestionType()
        Returns a multiple choice or single choice question type, which will decide which StepBody to use to display this question.
        Overrides:
        getQuestionType in class AnswerFormat
        Returns:
        the question type for this answer format

      • getChoices

        public Choice[] getChoices()
        Returns a copy of the choice array
        Returns:
        a copy of the choices for this question
